product_name: REI Half Dome 2 Replacement Pole Set
long_description: The REI Half Dome 2 Replacement Pole Set includes a complete set of DAC(R) NSL aluminum poles that fit both the 2012 and 2013 Half Dome 2 tents. Made from the same lightweight, durable material as the originals, and anodized without the use of harmful acids.
short_description: The REI Half Dome 2 Replacement Pole Set includes a complete set of DAC(R) NSL aluminum poles that fit both the 2012 and 2013 Half Dome 2 tents.
